H0.text: What won't a cockroach eat. Motor Oil

H1.text: What won't a cockroach eat. Copper

H2.text: What won't a cockroach eat. Soap

H3.text: What won't a cockroach eat. Pickles

A4.text: Significant long‑term effects have been found at concentrations of 310 ppm in several freshwater fish species and as low as 1 ppm in marine life forms.

A5.text: They are also bio‑based, biodegradable, non‑toxic and do not bioaccumulate in marine organisms.
